title: Base Time
description: Time spent in 'shocked' state, in milliseconds (ms). Scaled around default of 1000

title: Minimum Combo threshold
description: Set the combo threshold for the change to appear, in percent

title: Default State
description: The name of your pngtuber's default/idle state

title: Shocked State
description: The name of your pngtuber's shocked/upset state, triggered on miss over the combo threshold or reverse choke

title: Celebration State
description: The name of your pngtuber's happy state, triggered on FC
